title: Pennsylvania Firm Recalls Deli Ham Product Due To Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, June 27, 2014 E. G. Emils & Sons, Inc., a Philadelphia, Pa. establishment, is recalling approximately 5,896 pounds of deli ham product that may be contaminated with extraneous materials, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The following...
impacted_products: “Wegman’s Food You Feel Good About Organic Ham,” Wegman’s Private Label with pack lot numbers 14941309, 14941310 and 14941311.
